Title: Directs state agencies to adopt an embodied carbon decarbonization program
Summary: Directs state agencies to adopt an embodied carbon decarbonization program; requires the office of general services to continue to issue operational directives and guidance for common construction materials to reduce the amount of embodied carbon in such materials.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to directing state agencies to adopt an embodied carbon decarbonization program
